name: Imp Catcher
Start point: Wizard Mizgog on the 2nd floor[UK]3rd floor[US] of the Wizards' Tower, south of Draynor Village.
Description: Wizard Mizgog has had his magic beads stolen by pesky imps summoned by his rival, Wizard Grayzag. He needs an adventurer to retrieve the black, red, white, and yellow beads for him.
Recommended: Combat level to kill low-level Imps (optional)

substeps: Talk to Wizard Mizgog on the 2nd floor[UK]3rd floor[US] of the Wizards' Tower.
Agree to help him retrieve his four stolen beads: black, red, white, and yellow.

Kill Imps until you have obtained one of each bead (Black bead, Red bead, White bead, Yellow bead). Imps can be found in various locations, including around the Wizards' Tower, near Karamja volcano, or south-east of Falador.
Alternatively, you can buy the beads from other players.
Once you have all four beads, return to Wizard Mizgog in the Wizards' Tower.
Give him the beads to claim your reward.
